author: Staff Reporter
text:
Election officials are all set to complete the fixing of global positioning system (GPS) devices in the 24 vehicles allocated for the flying squads in eight Assembly segments in the district, by Monday. “GPS fixing has been completed in 12 vehicles now”, the officials said.

The GPS devices were fitted this time on the instructions of Election Commission to monitor the movements and avoid getting complaints, received in the past, that the squads did not reach trouble spots despite being alerted by people.

Collector S. Jayandhi and other officials monitored the fixing of GPS devices to ensure that the equipment were fitted properly.
title: GPS devices fixed in flying squad vehicles
